Business Advisors

Alumni Mentors

Nicoline Chan

Hi my name’s Nicoline Chan, and I just graduated from the University of Warwick in Accounting and Finance. My Enactus experience started as a project member of Fair Enterprise, which helped educate students about running a business. I then became a project leader, where I led a team to help combat loneliness the elderly were facing in care homes through craft sessions. Finally, I was Vice-President of Enactus Warwick in 2012-2013, overseeing the operations of the society. Now I’m based in London working as an ACA Graduate and mentoring LSE and City University Enactus teams.
